languages.text:
Аугментированная птица-фамильяр, связанная с хозяином прочной ментальной связью. Благодаря этой связи ворон усиливает псайкерские способности хозяина и даже позволяет ему видеть глазами фамильяра.
Подобных созданий часто можно встретить в свите псайкеров Инквизиции. Технология их производства считается сакральной.

traits.locale_text:
Аугментированная птица-фамильяр, связанная с хозяином прочной ментальной связью. Благодаря этой связи ворон усиливает псайкерские способности хозяина и даже позволяет ему видеть глазами фамильяра.
Подобных созданий часто можно встретить в свите псайкеров Инквизиции. Технология их производства считается сакральной.

languages.text:
An augmented bird familiar bound to its master by means of a strong mental connection. This bond allows the raven to enhance its owner's psyker abilities and even lets them see through their familiar's eyes.
Such creatures are most often seen in the retinue of Inquisitorial psykers. The technology behind their manufacture is considered sacred.
languages.original_text:
Аугментированная птица-фамильяр, связанная с хозяином прочной ментальной связью. Благодаря этой связи ворон усиливает псайкерские способности хозяина и даже позволяет ему видеть глазами фамильяра.
Подобных созданий часто можно встретить в свите псайкеров Инквизиции. Технология их производства считается сакральной.

traits.locale_text:
An augmented bird familiar bound to its master by means of a strong mental connection. This connection allows the raven to enhance its owner's psyker abilities and even lets them see through their familiar's eyes. It is said that any pain felt by the raven passes on to its master.
Such creatures are most often seen in the retinue of Inquisitorial psykers. The technology behind their manufacture is considered sacred.

An augmented bird familiar bound to its master by means of a strong mental connection. This connection allows the raven to enhance its owner's psyker abilities and even lets them see through their familiar's eyes. It is said that any pain felt by the raven passes on to its master.
Such creatures are most often seen in the retinue of Inquisitorial psykers. The technology behind their manufacture is considered sacred.

An augmented bird familiar bound to its master by means of a strong mental connection. This bond allows the raven to enhance its owner's psyker abilities and even lets them see through their familiar's eyes. It is said that any pain felt by the raven passes on to its master.
Such creatures are most often seen in the retinue of Inquisitorial psykers. The technology behind their manufacture is considered sacred.

An augmented bird familiar bound to its master by means of a strong mental connection. This bond allows the raven to enhance its owner's psyker abilities and even lets them see through their familiar's eyes. It is said that any pain felt by the raven passes on to its master.
Such creatures are most often seen in the retinue of Inquisitorial psykers. The technology behind their manufacture is considered sacred.

An augmented bird familiar bound to its master by means of a strong mental connection. This bond allows the raven to enhance its owner's psyker abilities and even lets them see through their familiar's eyes.
Such creatures are most often seen in the retinue of Inquisitorial psykers. The technology behind their manufacture is considered sacred.

An augmented bird familiar bound to its master by means of a strong mental connection. This bond allows the raven to enhance its owner's psyker abilities and even lets them see through their familiar's eyes.
Such creatures are most often seen in the retinue of Inquisitorial psykers. The technology behind their manufacture is considered sacred.

An augmented bird familiar bound to its master by means of a strong mental connection. This bond allows the raven to enhance its owner's psyker abilities and even lets them see through their familiar's eyes.
Such creatures are most often seen in the retinue of Inquisitorial psykers. The technology behind their manufacture is considered sacred.

languages.text:
Ein augmentierter Vogelvertrauter, der über eine starke mentale Verbindung an seinen Meister gebunden ist. Diese Verbindung ermöglicht dem Raben die Erweiterung der Psi-Fähigkeiten seines Besitzers, der überdies mit den Augen seines Vertrauten sehen kann.
Derartige Kreaturen sind oft im Gefolge von Psionikern der Inquisition anzutreffen. Die Technologie ihrer Herstellung gilt als heilig.
languages.original_text:
An augmented bird familiar bound to its master by means of a strong mental connection. This bond allows the raven to enhance its owner's psyker abilities and even lets them see through their familiar's eyes.
Such creatures are most often seen in the retinue of Inquisitorial psykers. The technology behind their manufacture is considered sacred.

traits.locale_text:
Ein augmentierter Vogelvertrauter, der über eine starke mentale Verbindung an seinen Meister gebunden ist. Diese Verbindung ermöglicht dem Raben die Erweiterung der Psi-Fähigkeiten seines Besitzers, der überdies mit den Augen seines Vertrauten sehen kann. Angeblich übertragen sich vom Raben empfundene Schmerzen auf seinen Meister.
Derartige Kreaturen sind oft im Gefolge von Psionikern der Inquisition anzutreffen. Die Technologie ihrer Herstellung gilt als heilig.

languages.text:
Un oiseau augmenté, lié à son maître par une puissante connexion mentale. Grâce à ce lien, le familier peut renforcer les aptitudes du psyker qui le contrôle et même lui permettre de voir à travers ses yeux.
Ces créatures conçues par une technologie sacrée font généralement partie de l'entourage des psykers de l'Inquisition.
languages.original_text:
An augmented bird familiar bound to its master by means of a strong mental connection. This bond allows the raven to enhance its owner's psyker abilities and even lets them see through their familiar's eyes.
Such creatures are most often seen in the retinue of Inquisitorial psykers. The technology behind their manufacture is considered sacred.

traits.locale_text:
Un oiseau augmenté, lié à son maître par une puissante connexion mentale. Grâce à ce lien, le familier peut renforcer les aptitudes du psyker qui le contrôle et même lui permettre de voir à travers ses yeux. On dit aussi que la douleur ressentie par la corneille est transmise à son maître.
Ces créatures conçues par une technologie sacrée font généralement partie de l'entourage des psykers de l'Inquisition.

languages.text:
这只渡鸦使仆由机械部件强化，可以通过强大的精神联结与主人保持同步。这种联结可以强化主人的灵能能力，甚至可以让主人通过使仆的双眼看到周围的一切。
这种使仆最常出现在审判庭灵能者的随从之中，制造这种生物的技术已被帝国认定为神圣技术。
languages.original_text:
An augmented bird familiar bound to its master by means of a strong mental connection. This bond allows the raven to enhance its owner's psyker abilities and even lets them see through their familiar's eyes.
Such creatures are most often seen in the retinue of Inquisitorial psykers. The technology behind their manufacture is considered sacred.

traits.locale_text:
这只渡鸦使仆由机械部件强化，可以通过强大的精神联结与主人保持同步。这种联结可以强化主人的灵能能力，甚至可以让主人通过使仆的双眼看到周围的一切。
这种使仆最常出现在审判庭灵能者的随从之中，制造这种生物的技术已被帝国认定为神圣技术。

这只渡鸦使仆由机械部件强化，可以通过强大的精神联结与主人保持同步。这种联结可以强化主人的灵能能力，甚至可以让主人通过使仆的双眼看到周围的一切。据说，生化渡鸦感受到的所有痛苦，都会原封不动地传达至主人身上。
这种使仆最常出现在审判庭灵能者的随从之中，制造这种生物的技术已被帝国认定为神圣技术。

这只渡鸦使仆由机械部件强化，可以通过强大的精神联结与主人保持同步。这种联结可以强化主人的灵能能力，甚至可以让主人通过使仆的双眼看到周围的一切。据说，生化渡鸦感受到的所有痛苦，都会原封不动地传达至主人身上。
这种使仆最常出现在审判庭灵能者的随从之中，制造这种生物的技术已被帝国认定为神圣技术。

languages.text:
Un familiar aviar aumentado vinculado a su amo mediante una fuerte conexión mental. Este vínculo permite al cuervo reforzar las capacidades psíquicas de su amo e incluso posibilita ver a través de los ojos del familiar.
Estas criaturas suelen encontrarse en el séquito de los psíquicos inquisitoriales. La tecnología con la que se fabrican se considera sagrada.
languages.original_text:
An augmented bird familiar bound to its master by means of a strong mental connection. This bond allows the raven to enhance its owner's psyker abilities and even lets them see through their familiar's eyes.
Such creatures are most often seen in the retinue of Inquisitorial psykers. The technology behind their manufacture is considered sacred.

traits.locale_text:
Un familiar aviar aumentado vinculado a su amo mediante una fuerte conexión mental. Este vínculo permite al cuervo reforzar las capacidades psíquicas de su amo e incluso posibilita ver a través de los ojos del familiar. Se dice que el dolor que siente el cuervo se transmite a su amo.
Estas criaturas suelen encontrarse en el séquito de los psíquicos inquisitoriales. La tecnología con la que se fabrican se considera sagrada.

languages.text: 強力な精神的なつながりによって主人と結ばれた、オーギュメント化された鳥のファミリアー。カラスは絆により、主人の異能者の能力を高め、さらにはファミリアーの目を通して見ることさえ可能にする。このような生物は、主に異能者である異端審問官の随行に見られる。その製造に用いられる技術は神聖視されている。
languages.original_text:
An augmented bird familiar bound to its master by means of a strong mental connection. This bond allows the raven to enhance its owner's psyker abilities and even lets them see through their familiar's eyes.
Such creatures are most often seen in the retinue of Inquisitorial psykers. The technology behind their manufacture is considered sacred.

traits.locale_text:
強力な精神的なつながりによって主人と結ばれた、オーギュメント化された鳥のファミリアー。カラスは絆により、主人の異能者の能力を高め、さらにはファミリアーの目を通して見ることさえ可能にする。カラスが感じた痛みは、そのまま主人にも伝わると言われている。
このような生物は、主に異能者である異端審問官の随行に見られる。その製造に用いられる技術は神聖視されている。

強力な精神的なつながりによって主人と結ばれた、オーギュメント化された鳥のファミリアー。カラスは絆により、主人の異能者の能力を高め、さらにはファミリアーの目を通して見ることさえ可能にする。カラスが感じた痛みは、そのまま主人にも伝わると言われている。
このような生物は、主に異能者である異端審問官の随行に見られる。その製造に用いられる技術は神聖視されている。

languages.text:
Sahibine kuvvetli bir zihinsel bağla bağlı, ogmentasyonlarla güçlendirilmiş bir kuş. Bu bağ sayesinde kuzgunun sahibinin ruhsezer kabiliyetleri artar, hatta iyesinin gözlerinden bile görebilir.
Bu tür yaratıklar, genellikle Engizisyon ruhsezerlerinin maiyetinde görünür. İmalat teknolojisi kutsal addedilir.
languages.original_text:
An augmented bird familiar bound to its master by means of a strong mental connection. This bond allows the raven to enhance its owner's psyker abilities and even lets them see through their familiar's eyes.
Such creatures are most often seen in the retinue of Inquisitorial psykers. The technology behind their manufacture is considered sacred.

traits.locale_text:
Sahibine kuvvetli bir zihinsel bağla bağlı, ogmentasyonlarla güçlendirilmiş bir kuş. Bu bağ sayesinde kuzgunun sahibinin ruhsezer kabiliyetleri artar, hatta iyesinin gözlerinden bile görebilir. Kuzgunun hissettiği her türlü acının, sahibine de geçtiği söylenir.
Bu tür yaratıklar, genellikle Engizisyon ruhsezerlerinin maiyetinde görünür. İmalat teknolojisi kutsal addedilir.
